reviews.name: 3m Photo Mount Spray Adhesive
reviews.reviewText: If you spray the adhesive on the cricut cutting matt and let it sit awhile it returns the matt to almost new like condition and allows you to continue with your crafting. Saves you a ton of money on cricut matts.
reviews.title: Works well with the cricut

reviews.name: 3m Photo Mount Spray Adhesive
reviews.reviewText:
This is, by far the best adhesive I've ever used. I bought it to use for scrap booking and I've found nothing better.It is convient to use, and the application is very even and accurate.
I also used it to hold the fabric when I recovered my dinning room chairs. It work perfectly to hold the fabric to the batting. This way everything came out smooth, no pleats or puckers!! I can hardly wait to see what other uses I can find for this product!!!!Thanks Scotch!
reviews.title: Stick it and Forget it

reviews.name: 3m Photo Mount Spray Adhesive
reviews.reviewText: the photo mount adhesive is strong and stays strong.
reviews.title: Mount Adhesive

reviews.name: 3m Photo Mount Spray Adhesive
reviews.reviewText: this is agreat product it works well i recommend it too any one!
reviews.title: 3m photo mount adhesive
